meanings.sent1: She disinvited him from the party after he behaved rudely.
meanings.sent2: They disinvited their neighbors to the barbecue due to limited space.
meanings.sent3: The host disinvited the noisy neighbor to avoid chaos.
meanings.sent4: The rain disinvited the picnic, forcing everyone indoors.
meanings.sent5: The bride disinvited her ex-boyfriend to prevent any drama at the wedding.

meanings.sent1: He disinvited his friend from the trip because of a change in plans.
meanings.sent2: The event planner disinvited the unresponsive guests to make room for others.
meanings.sent3: The magician disinvited the rabbit from the hat trick, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: The storm disinvited the outdoor concert, moving it to an indoor venue.
meanings.sent5: The museum disinvited the controversial artist from exhibiting their work.
